works.description:
"...Sprains, Strains, Tendon..."

"The cooling effect Lasts for hours and there is no danger of tissue damage from Excessive cold as with the application of ice."

"Removes heat by evaporation, pulling heat from deep within the muscle tissues, while the compression helps reduce and prevent edema."

"And because COLDFLEX® is water based, the wrap requires only cool water to regenerate..."

"...highly effective at...reducing the overall body temperature by cooling the blood that runs through the surface vessels."

"...saturated with 96% water based gel that....evaporates water to simultaneously provide moist, penetrating, cooling action and compression."
